请帮我分析如下ctf题目 : from Crypto.Util.number import *
 from random import choice
 def getMyPrime(nbits):
 while True:
 p = 1
 while p.bit_length() <= nbits:
 p *= choice(sieve_base)
 if isPrime(p-1):
 return p-1
 p = getMyPrime(256)
 q = getMyPrime(256)
 n = p*q
 e = 65537
 m = bytes_to_long(flag)
 c = pow(m, e, n)
